name: Hero for Genesis Framework
author: phpbits

sections.description:
Easy & Powerful just like Genesis Framework

Easy
Add hero image and any content via widgets! Drag and Drop your desired contents, choose the background hero image and your done! Easy as pie!

Powerful
Add anything via widget! From welcome text to subscription form as long as there’s a widget you can have it! Integrated gracefully with the framework you can customize the view as full window height and behind the header section. Wait for it…. hooks & filters for geeky fellows to control and modify the views, very well documented just like Genesis ðŸ˜‰

I can’t define the plugin’s awesomeness, describe it your self then. Take a look at the demo and spread the love by sharing. Thank you!

Demo Links

  • Full Height & Behind Header Section
  • Behind Header Section & Not Full Height
  • Below Header Section
  • Hero with Primary Navigation
  • Hero as Header Background

Need Help? there is help tab on the plugin settings page, though I can’t guarantee fast response I assure you I’ll contact you immediately once I read it.

Rate it! I don’t care if you love it or not, your rating is important to me to continously improve this plugin.

Share the Love & Buy me a beer! If you feel generous enough and feels that you want to support the development by means of donation, you can donate anytime here

…and more! Think out of the box

Visit the documentation page to see how you can use this plugin aside from hero and header section. Spoiler, you can also use it on the footer if you want to. View samples below:

Extended Demo Links

  • Hero on Footer Section

Translators

  • French (fr_FR) – JP – TWF
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Go to documentation page to get started : http://hero.phpbits.space/documentation/
sections.faq:
How to Add Hero Image

  • Go to Appearance > Widgets then drag & drop “Hero: Background Image” to Hero For Genesis Sidebar Widget. You can upload image there

How to Add Content

  • Drag & Drop any Widget under Appearance > Widgets : “Hero For Genesis Sidebar”, start with the text widget and you’ll see how it works.

How to Change Color Scheme & Styling

  • Go to Genesis > Hero for Genesis under general tab you can easily set colors using the colorpicker options.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Add French Translation by JP – TWF

1.0

  • Initial Plugin release

short_description: Easiest and Powerful way to add header, hero image & content to your Genesis powered sites. Powered by native widget, you can add almost anything!
